megaMod_changelog_title: Changelog | The MegaMod
megaMod_changelog_wtc: What the cluck is The MegaMod?
p_settings_mods_title: Eggcellent Mods | The MegaMod
p_settings_mods_reload_desc1: Please reload the page so that your updated mod settings can take effect!
p_settings_mods_reload_desc2: If you choose to dismiss this message, your updated settings will take effect the next time you open Shell Shockers.
p_settings_mods_info_desc1: Enhance your Shell Shockers experience with The MegaMod. From fun features to useful additions that elevate the game's functionality, this culmination of all of Infinite Smasher's mods (with new additions and features), is your one-stop solution!
p_settings_mods_info_desc2: To view info about a mod or change its settings, press the icon next to its name.
p_settings_mods_info_desc3: If you have any feedback, suggestions, or bug reports, join the Infinite's Shell Mods Discord!
megaMod_disableModsPopup_desc:
The MegaMod contains the latest versions of Better Inventory, Legacy Mode, Egg Color Slider, Hide HUD, and Speedrun Timer.

Having these mods running on a different script will cause errors for The MegaMod.

Please disable any of those mod scripts (if you have them enabled) so that you don't miss out on having the latest versions of them (with better features) through The MegaMod!

Disabled Mods / Settings:

{0}
megaMod_modErrsPopup_desc_1:
There was an error while starting The MegaMod!

Certain mods or their settings may not show up or work correctly.

This may be due to other mods that you have enabled so please disable any other mod scripts you have running and try again.

Affected Mods:

{0}
megaMod_modErrsPopup_desc_2:
There was an error while starting The MegaMod!

The MegaMod was unable to modify the Shell Shockers source code.

Certain mods or their settings may not work correctly.
megaMod_updatePopup_desc:
A new version of The MegaMod is available!

Please click the "Gimme Update!" button to install version {0} so that you don't miss out on the latest features and bugfixes!

Continuing to use this (outdated) version may lead to Shell Shockers or The MegaMod not working properly!

This Shell Shockers tab will automatically reload after you install the update and return to this tab.
megaMod_updatedPopup_desc:
The MegaMod has been updated to version {0}!

Thanks for installing the update and enjoy your enhanced Shell Shockers experience with the latest version of The MegaMod!
p_settings_mods_megaMod_desc: Here's where you can change settings for The MegaMod itself.
p_settings_mods_betterUI_desc:
Inventory & Profile Upgrades - new item themes, skin randomizer, profile badges, UI improvements, and MOAR!
NOTE: Accounts that don't have a profile picture get a default one displayed.
p_bundle_item_desc: Bundle Items are exclusive skins - including premium and non-premium skins - that can only be obtained by purchasing bundles. These items are not available individually in the shop or through other means, making them unique to their respective bundles.
p_premium_item_desc: Premium items can be purchased in the shop using real money. These exclusive items include gun skins and melee weapons with unique sound effects, and grenades that feature both custom sound and explosion effects!
p_eggpremium_item_desc: Want awesome premium skins without spending real money? Egg Premium items are exclusive premium items that can be purchased in the shop using golden eggs instead of cash!
p_vip_item_desc: VIP items are exclusive premium items available only while your VIP subscription is active. Once your subscription ends, these items will be removed from your account.
p_merch_item_desc: Merch Items are among the rarest of items. Players could once obtain them by purchasing official Shell Shockers merch, which came with exclusive item codes. While they are no longer available through merch purchases, the only current way to get them is by winning the 'Nothing Wheel' giveaway on Blue Wizard Digital's Twitch stream and landing on 'Any one skin'.
p_merch_item_btn: Visit the BWD Merch Store!
p_drops_item_desc: Twitch Drops items are exclusive skins earned during Twitch Drops Events. They are unlocked by watching Shell Shockers streamers on Twitch for specific amounts of time. To claim them, players must link their Twitch account on the Twitch Drops dashboard. Check the dashboard for the latest Twitch Drops Event!
p_drops_item_btn: Visit the Twitch Drops Dashboard!
p_notif_item_desc: Notification Items are a collection of super rare and OG hats. Originally created during the early days of the game's development, these items were designed specifically as notification rewards. The skinset includes iconic subsets like Skull Hats, Egg Hats, Chicken Skull Hats, and the Golden Hats. Over time, some of these items have made a return — for example, some of the Golden Hats were reintroduced during the Fighting Eggflation update and made available in the shop for golden eggs. Many of these items have also recently been included in Chick'n Winner as possible rewards. While once highly sought-after, their return has significantly lowered their rarity in the eyes of veteran "OG" players.
p_league_item_desc: League Items are exclusive rewards earned by top-performing clans in competitive Shell Shockers leagues, especially the long-running Shell League. These items include custom clan stamps and, more recently, clan hats. Stamps are given in limited quantities to key clan members and are used to showcase team strength during matches. Some clans, like Aries and DXG, have multiple exclusive stamps, while others like TXC and GOD have one code-exclusive and one shop-available version. Starting in 2022, winning clans could have a custom hat added to the game, with the NPS Hat being the first. However, after Season 5 - Sekuna in 2024, custom hats were discontinued due to internal changes, and winners now receive custom clan stamps instead.
p_yolker_item_desc: New Yolker Items are exclusive in-game rewards distributed through The New Yolker newsletter. Since September 2021 (Issue 32), each issue has included a limited-time link that grants a free item directly to a player's account, replacing the old item code system. These new links expire one month after they are sent. Starting in 2020, a special Christmas edition of the newsletter is sent out each year, offering a holiday-themed item. These items have become a key way for players to collect exclusive and seasonal skins.
p_yolker_item_btn: Subscribe to The New Yolker!
p_egglite_item_desc: Egglite Items are classic, rare skins that were designed to be unlocked through item codes won in giveaways. These items include unique hats and skins that have become collector's favorites over time. While most Egglite Items were only obtainable via codes, a select handful have since been added to Chick'n Winner as potential rewards, giving players another chance to unlock these nostalgic and highly sought-after skins.
p_creatoryt_item_desc: YouTube Content Creator Items are unique skins themed after official Blue Wizard Digital YouTube creators. These items—often hats or skins—are usually added to the game when a creator reaches Partner Creator status. However, in some cases, they've been added due to popular demand from the community. They reflect the creator's branding and are typically permanentaly purchasable in the shop for golden eggs. YouTube Creators often give away their own items, making them popular collectibles among fans.
p_creatorttv_item_desc: Twitch Content Creator Items are unique skins inspired by official Blue Wizard Digital Twitch streamers. Like their YouTube counterparts, these items are generally added when a streamer becomes a Partner Creator, though some have been introduced thanks to strong community support. In addition to usually being available in the shop for golden eggs, these skins are often given away on livestreams or special events hosted by the streamer.
p_limited_item_desc: Limited Items are special skins that are only available in the shop until the next game update. They often celebrate holidays like Halloween or Christmas, or showcase fun themes like Dinosaurs or Breakfast. The Limited section also includes Unvaulted Items, which are older skins temporarily brought back based on popularity, including past VIP items and holiday exclusives. Buy them before they're gone!
p_social_item_desc: Social Items are skins themed after various social media platforms and are unlocked by following Blue Wizard Digital on the corresponding platform. To claim them, players can click the social media icons located in the bottom right corner of the Shell Shockers homepage or click directly on the items below (if not already owned). Each item represents a different platform and is a fun way to show your support for Blue Wizard Digital!
p_promo_item_desc: Promo Items are exclusive skins earned through special promotional events, including cross-promotions with other Blue Wizard Digital games or newsletters announcing new game releases. These items are limited-time rewards that celebrate collaborations and milestones within the Blue Wizard community.
p_event_item_desc: Event Items are exclusive skins awarded for participating in community events like the annual EGG ORG event in April and special events such as the Scavenger Hunt. These limited-time items recognize player involvement and add unique flair tied to memorable in-game events.
p_legacy_item_desc: A blast from the past! Legacy Items are the original default gun skins from before version 0.25.5 (2019), featuring simpler, less colorful designs and different sound effects. With the "Legacy Mode" mod included in The MegaMod, players can experience these classic skins and sounds, bringing the game's earlier look and feel back to life.
megaMod_betterUI_badgePopup_desc: Explore the complete collection of available profile badges! Each badge is shown below with its icon, name, and a brief description to help you understand its significance and how to earn it.
megaMod_betterUI_badgePopup_main_desc: Core Badges have unique requirements without any progressive tiers (levels).
megaMod_betterUI_badgePopup_tier_desc: Tier Badges are progressive achievements with multiple tiers (levels). Each tier has a specific requirement that you must meet. The highest tier of a particular badge will be shown on your profile.
megaMod_betterUI_badge_mod_desc: Be one of the BWD Discord moderators
megaMod_betterUI_badge_eggforcer_desc: Be one of the Shell moderators (Eggforcers)
megaMod_betterUI_badge_sl_desc: Be a staff member of the official Shell League
megaMod_betterUI_badge_wiki_desc: Be a staff member on the official Shell Shockers Wiki
megaMod_betterUI_badge_newbie_desc: Account less than a month old
megaMod_betterUI_badge_eggorg20_desc: Participated in the first EGG ORG event (2020)
megaMod_betterUI_badge_eggorg21_desc: Participated in the "EGG ORG: Phase II" (EGG ORG 2021) event
megaMod_betterUI_badge_eggorg23_desc: Participated in the "EGG ORG & Eggventure" (EGG ORG 2023) event
megaMod_betterUI_badge_eggorg24_desc: Participated in the "Rise of the Robots" (EGG ORG 2024) event
megaMod_betterUI_badge_eggorg25_eggfu_de: Played as an Egg-Fu Master during the "Shadow War" (EGG ORG 2025) event
megaMod_betterUI_badge_eggorg25_eggsassi: Played as an Eggsassin during the "Shadow War" (EGG ORG 2025) event
megaMod_betterUI_badge_eggorg25_desc: Participated in the "Shadow War" (EGG ORG 2025) event
megaMod_betterUI_badge_scavenger22_desc: Participated in the 2022 Scavenger Hunt event
megaMod_betterUI_badge_tester_desc: Helped playtest The MegaMod before its release - tysm!
megaMod_betterUI_badge_social_desc: Be an official Blue Wizard Digital {0} Content Creator
megaMod_betterUI_badge_modekills_desc: Have {0} lifetime kill{s} in every game mode
megaMod_betterUI_badge_weaponkills_desc: Have {0} lifetime kill{s} with every weapon
megaMod_betterUI_badge_modekdr_desc: Have a {0} lifetime KDR in every game mode
megaMod_betterUI_badge_limited_desc: Own {over}{0}% of the current update's Limited Edition items
megaMod_betterUI_challengePopup_desc: Below is a complete list of all the available challenges in the game. You can view information about each challenge such as its icon, name, description, reward amount, the number of times you've claimed it, etc.
megaMod_betterUI_mapPopup_desc: Below is a list of all the maps currently available in the public map pool as well as the game modes they're available in. The public map pool currently consists of {0} maps.
megaMod_betterUI_gameHistoryPopup_desc:
Below is a list of all the games (lobbies) you have played in today. Click one to try rejoining it!
Game Codes are colored red or green depending on whether a game is still open to join.
megamod_betterUI_itemVault_title: The Item Vault
megamod_betterUI_itemVault_enter: Enter The Item Vault
megamod_betterUI_itemVault_exit: Leave The Item Vault
megamod_betterUI_i_eq_emptyVault_text: You have fully looted the Item Vault. Nice!
p_settings_mods_betterChat_desc: Various tweaks and improvements to the in-game chat.
leave_game_to_join_other_desc: Leave this game to join a different one?
p_settings_mods_colorSlider_desc:
Adds working sliders (hue, saturation, and brightness) for selecting your egg color in the inventory. Also adds a color randomizer button because why not :)
NOTE: This is a client-sided mod so other players will see your egg color as white when you use custom colors.
p_settings_mods_legacyMode_desc: Go back in time with the return of the legacy default gun skins and old in-game sound effects from 2018/2019!
p_settings_mods_hideHUD_desc: Hide/Show the HUD (In-Game UI) while playing or in spectate mode! Useful for cinematic shots and recording clean clips.
p_settings_mods_killstreakInfo_desc: Adds a stopwatch that starts when you spawn, along with a popup (COMING SOON) that can be toggled on/off to display useful stats about your kill streaks. Also useful for timed challenges.
p_settings_mods_matchGrenades_desc: Sets the grenade pickups (on the ground) to the grenade skin that you're currently using. Also works when spectating another player in first-person spectate mode!
p_settings_mods_changeFPS_desc:
Allows you to change your FPS! :O
NOTE: This is a bit buggy and you may reach a point where your device can't support any higher of a framerate so your FPS will max out.
p_settings_mods_specTweaks_desc: Some useful tweaks related to spectate mode.
p_settings_mods_pbSpin_desc: Want a better look at your loadout? This mod allows you to spin your egg 360° in the photobooth! The 360° spin can also be exported in GIF format (coming soon).
p_settings_mods_themeManager_desc:
Allows you to select themes that change various parts of the UI such as the menu backgrounds, button/icon colors, crosshair, scope, and more!
Have a cool theme and want it featured in The MegaMod? Join the Infinite's Shell Mods Discord server!
p_settings_mods_themeManager_theme_infin: Infinite Smasher's own theme! And yes...it's very blue...everywhere.
p_settings_mods_themeManager_theme_grays: Theme for graysocean, created by Infinite Smasher. This theme used to be available on the Chrome WebStore as an extension but it isn't anymore. This is an updated and improved version of it! Be sure to watch the official showcase video!
Same as the Main graysocean theme but with a modified in-game UI. Content creator badges are hidden on the leaderboard and the "killed by" and "you killed" text is themed for fashion shows.
p_settings_mods_themeManager_theme_boole: Play like a pro with the Boolet x DeltaStorm theme! Created by boolet and updated by Infinite Smasher. This theme used to be available on the Chrome WebStore as an extension but it isn't anymore. This is an updated and improved version of it!
p_settings_mods_themeManager_theme_hayde: King Hayden's Theme. Created by Jayvan and updated by Infinite Smasher.
p_settings_mods_themeManager_theme_novo_: Novosuper's Theme. Created by Jayvan and updated by Infinite Smasher.
p_settings_mods_themeManager_theme_meno_: menoXD's Theme. Created by Jayvan and updated by Infinite Smasher.
p_settings_mods_themeManager_theme_gus_d: Gus's Theme. Created by Gus. Thanks to d4n, Infinite Smasher, Grif, Jayvan, and Renzo for the help. Thanks to Astra, Blue Panda, and Ishmyster for the art. Check out the matching "Gus" Skybox available through the Custom Skybox mod!
p_settings_mods_themeManager_theme_zaxon: Zaxonius' Theme. Created by Created by Zaxonius, based on the Infinite Smasher theme.
p_settings_mods_customSkybox_desc: What's up?....The Skybox! Tired of looking at the same boring skies while shootin' eggs? Well now you can choose between over 60+ different skyboxes or any solid color for all maps to use!
p_settings_mods_customFog_desc:
CURRENTLY BROKEN as fog doesn't work in regular (unmodded) Shell either!

Enhance your game's atmosphere with customizable fog! Adjust the density and color to create anything from an eerie mist to complete blindness across all maps.
p_settings_mods_customFog_resetBtn: Reset to Default Fog for Map
p_settings_mods_betterEggforce_desc: Adds some useful improvements and new features to make Eggforcing better! Now go swing that ban hammer!
megaMod_betterEggforce_banHistoryPopup_d: Below is a list of all the bans you have handed out with The MegaMod enabled. Click on a ban to view all the previous bans for that player.
